title: FINAL BONDAGE MUMMY: HYPER-REALISTIC HORROR HOTEL
description: "Stefanie was just doing her Boy Friend Zack a simple favor . . . ok, maybe a little more complex and intense favor then normal . . . but she can remind him about it when she wants a bigger favor in return . . .The text said - [Can you help out my Friend Blair? She runs that Horror Hotel place, you know, that Extra Realistic Haunted House thingy we've been to. The Girl who normally plays the Mummy can't make it this weekend . . . that's if you don't mind being wrapped up helpless like a Mummy for a while]Stefanie decides to bring her little friend, a programmable vibrating egg to keep her entertained for the two eight hour shifts . . . I mean, what else is a Girl gonna do?It doesn't take long after learning inside the Mummy costume is a skin tight Bondage Sleep Sack to hold her firm . . . a hose allowing her a supply of Energy Water . . . and Blair, well there's more to her then Stefanie could imagine . . . this just became the Biggest Favor Ever!Just how long is Blair planning to keep Stefanie helpless? How many more people are trapped like she is? When will Zack come and Save here? Why is Everyone who comes through the Horror Hotel Groping her Breasts? Just how much more will that Spray Foam Insulation be Expanding? . . ."As the First of My Planned Series of 'Hyper-Realistic Horror Hotel', things get a littler Darker then Normal . . . I like to see this Series as part of my 'Zatanna Xtra Dark' Stories. My Goal, with your Approval, is to share more about the Horror Hotel and its un-willing Customers, every few weeks . . ."Love Zatanna . . . Xtra Dark ; ) Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Prolonged Bondage, BDSM, Distress, Sensory Deprivation, Mummification, Blood, Suffocation . . . Oh, and a Little Vibrating 'MyEgg' with a battery that just won't quit ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
